description:
How would you like to click ONE BUTTON and have a tribe of raving fans salivating to hear you speak about your area of expertise?

What would it be like to have a ready-made source of traffic that DOESN'T require:

  • A video camera
  • A lighting kit
  • A teleprompter
  • Editing software
  • A lot of time and effort

How would you like to schedule a webinar and fill it up fast just by chatting with your target audience, any time day or night, from around the world?

The best thing to come to the social media world since Facebook itself is HERE!

Periscope is an app that will change the way you do business. From ANYWHERE, you can now do a livestream broadcast and connect with your dream clients and customers! How cool is that?

In this course, I'm going to take you by the hand and show you how to:

  • Install and set up the Periscope app for success
  • Find followers who want to hear everything you have to say
  • Follow thought leaders in your industry
  • Create headlines that people want to click on without hesitation
  • Use hashtags to find the right people to watch your scope
  • Sell your products and services
  • Do a live broadcast
  • And much more!

So, if you want to take the plunge into Periscope, click on the TAKE THIS COURSE button and let's get started!
title: Profit On Periscope: Selling On Your Own Broadcast Channel
